sentence.Network_en: Their frequency of use both justifies and requires the memorization.
sentence.Network_cn: 频繁的使用需要记忆,也促进了记忆.

sentence.Network_en: This reduces the burden of memorization and helps you learn faster.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样可以减少你的记忆量,帮助你更快的学习.

sentence.Network_en: Rote memorization has been the educator's standard operating procedure for centuries.
sentence.Network_cn: 几个世纪以来,死记硬背一直是教育工作者奉行的标准教学方法.
